Monocle .A Chauveinc, Marc A new processing format, based on MARC II and some of BNB's elaborations of MARC II.. It further enlarges MARC II to encompass French cataloging practices and filing arrangements in French catalogs.. .X 16	1	864 63	1	864 175	1	864 235	2	864 250	1	864 289	2	864 291	1	864 348	1	864 389	1	864 390	1	864 404	1	864 487	1	864 502	1	864 548	1	864 579	1	864 594	1	864 596	1	864 597	1	864 598	1	864 600	1	864 601	2	864 799	1	864 805	1	864 807	1	864 836	1	864 863	3	864 864	5	864 865	1	864 866	1	864 868	1	864 897	2	864 916	1	864 936	1	864 956	1	864 963	1	864 987	1	864 988	1	864 989	1	864 1042	1	864 1052	1	864 1152	2	864 1248	1	864 1265	1	864 1294	1	864 1327	1	864 1392	1	864 1392	1	864
